string.text: A Bandit has stolen Xenotech's gunsmith tools. Find the thief and get his tools back.

A Bandit raided my shop while I was out and stole some of my tools. I can't perform any weapon upgrades without them. I think I know who it was too, if you can track the bastard down and get my gunsmith tools back, I'll reward you and I'll be able to perform basic upgrades to your gear.
Excellent. Now that I have my tools back I can perform basic upgrades to your gear. Please, take this as a reward.
Xenotech's shipment of technician tools never arrived. Find the tools and return them to Xenotech.

I was expecting a delivery of some specialized tools that will allow me to do more advanced upgrades on your gear. It is long overdue, I suspect the courier was either killed or got drunk and wandered off. I think I know where he might have left them. If you want to pick them up for me I'll pay you and I'll be able to upgrade your gear even further.
Thanks, here's your payment. Let me know if there are any upgrades you would like me to do.
Search for a set of armorer's tools so Xenotech can fully upgrade your gear.

If you want me upgrade your gear fully, I'm going to need a set of armorer's tools. I have an idea where you might be able to find some, but you'll have to search around for them. If you can find a set, bring them to me. I'll pay you for them and I'll be able to perform almost any upgrade on your equipment.
Ah, good, you found some. Now I can perform almost any equipment upgrade. Thank you stalker.
